body_html:
Thanks for your comments. I found some solutions on stackoverflow, here is the link:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34945554/how-to-set-layer-wise-learning-rate-in-tensorflow
I didn't try, but I guess it works in that way. However it does not work like what I would expect.
